name: Bazaar
description: A lively marketplace with stalls selling exotic goods; adventurers can haggle for rare items, meet traveling merchants, or get swept up in the crowd.
atmosphere: The marketplace buzzes with the energy of commerce, with merchants calling out their wares in multiple languages. The air is filled with the scent of exotic spices, fresh produce, and cooking food. Colorful fabrics and unusual goods create a riot of color, while the press of bodies and the sound of haggling creates a constant hum of activity.
